titleStmt.title: SII 5.295: original edition by H. Krishna Sastri
No. 295. (A.R. No. 7 of 1894). ON THE WEST WALL OF THE SAME SHRINE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . Etat samasta lokeśamaulimālopalāḷitam . śāsanam śāśvatam śa
mbho ḥ śrīmūlasthānavāsinām . śrīpāṇṭināṭṭu maturotayavaḻanāṭṭut teṉkallaka
nāṭṭu parākkiramapāṇṭiyapurattu śrīmūlasthāna muṭaiyār koyil civavākkiyatevaṉ tiru
k kāvaṇattuk kūṭi niṟain=ta perun=tirukūṭṭattu śrīrudra śrīmāheśvarare
cam teṉkallakanāṭṭup parākkiramapāṇṭiyapurattu viyāpāri perum ⌈ru
ṭaiyāṉ tevaṉ maṉṉu tivākaraṉukku tānI
ttevar tevatāṉattu nāyaṉār tirukaṇṇokkukku
kumaṉai Iraṇṭum tapasiyārkke maṭamāka taṉ vastu
nāyanār śrīpaṇṭāratte Oṭukki Imaṭam tapasiyark
kē vilai Oṟṟi taṉmatānam celvatāka ceytamai
kku Aruḷāl nāṟpatteṇṇāyira śrīkaraṇattān Eḷuttu
Ippaṭi Aṟiveṉ śrīvāsutevaṉ Utaiyabhāstarabha ṭṭan Eḻuttu
Ippaṭikku tiruppatiyam viṇṇappañ ceyyum pum Uṭaiyapiḷḷai Eḻuttu
rum paḻa mpaṭi brahmateyamumāy varukiṟapaṭiyu n=tavirntu
muṉṟāvatu mutal Ittevaṟke kārāṇmai mikāṭcci Uṭppa
ṭap puravariviḷākameṉṉum piyarāl veṟupiṟittu An=tarāya
muḷppaṭat tevatāṉa Iṟaiyiliyāka Iṭṭukkuṭukkat tiruvāy
moḻin=taruḷiṉapaṭi Ivai teṉṉavaṉmutalināṭṭu muven=taveḷā
ṉeḻuttu Ivaiko ṭumaḻuruṭaiyāṉ kaṇapuravaṉ kuvalayabhaṭāraṉāṉa ku
maṇarāja ṉeḻuttu . Innilattukkut tiruvāykkeḷvit tirumukaprasāta
ñ ceytaruḷiṉa Uḷvarippaṭi An=tarāya muḷppaṭat tevatāṉa Iṟaiyili Iṭ=ṭapa
ṭikkumāvatu kkum Uḷvari teṉkallakanāṭṭu cen=ta ṉerika
ṭṭikkaḷḷur śrīmulasāna muṭaiyār koyilil pākaṉūṟakūṟṟattuc coḻān=taka
ccaturvvetimaṅkalattu brāhmaṇaṉ tirukkaṭavūr cuppiramaṇṇiyaṉ cirāmaṉāṉa ce
racikāmaṇibrahmamārāyaṉum karumāṇikkam cirāmaṉāṉa śrīvallavabrahmamārāyaṉum
Uḷḷiṭṭār kūṭasthar Eḻun=taruḷuvitta kūttāṭumtevaṟkum Ivar nampirāṭṭi
yāṟkum tiruppaṭimāṟṟuḷḷiṭṭu veṇṭum niman=taṅkaḷukku Iṟuppatāka yā
ṇṭu 3 vatiṉ Etirāmāṇṭu mutal An=tarāyamuḷppaṭa tevatāṉa Iṟaiyili
yiṭṭa pākaṉūṟkūṟṟattuc coḻān=takaccaturvvetimaṅkalattu tirukkaṭavūrc
cuppiramaṉ cirāmaṉāṉa ceracikāmaṇibrahmamārāyaṉum karumāṇikkam cirāmaṉāṉa
śrīvallavabrahma māraāyaṉum Uḷḷiṭṭār kūṭastar kāṇiyāy Ittevaṟkku
taṉmatāṉamāka Ivarkaḷ nirvārttu kuṭutta pramāṇappaṭi Ivvūr melpi
ṭākai paṭṭakuṟucci paḻampaṭi nila muṉṟaraiye Iraṇṭumāvum muṉṉuṭai
yārum paḻam paḻamperum brahmateyamumāy varukiṟapaṭiyum yāṇṭu 3 vati
ṉ Etirāmāṇṭu mutal tavirn=tu Ittevaṟkey kārāṇmai mikāḷcciyuḷ
ppaṭa puravariviḻākameṉṉum peyarāl veṟupiṟittu yāṇṭu 3 Āvatiṉ Etirā
māṇṭumutal An=tarāyamuḷppaṭa tevatāṉa Iṟaiyiliyāṉamaikku Ivai pura
varitiṇaikkaḻattu mukaveṭṭi Ālaṅkuṭaiyā ṉeḻuttu Ivai puravari tiṇaikkaḻaṅ
kāḷaka neḻuttu varikkūṟu viraviccātira muven=taveḷā ṉeḻuttu Ivai pura
varitiṇaikkaḷanāyakam poṉpaṟṟiuṭaiyā ṉeḻuttu Ivai puravariti
ṇaikkaḷanaāyakam kāvaṉūrkiḻava ṉeḻuttu Ivai puravaritiṇaikkaḷamukave
ṭṭi kāṭan=taikuṭaiyā ṉeḻuttu Ivai puravaritiṇaikkaḻanāyaka māyalūru
ṭaiyā ṉeḻuttu
Ivai tevarkaṉmi kaṇṇan tiruppūvaṇamuṭaiyānāna viraiyāviṭaṅ
kabhaṭṭaṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai ceramān=to ḻaṉ Eḻuttu .. Ivai
niṟaṇiñcāṉ Eṭuttapātamāṉa poṉmāḷikaippiccaṉ Eḻuttu .
Digital edition of SII 5.295 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Renato Dávalos.
